sentences.sContent: They applaud their favorite comedienne as she come on the stage.
sentences.sContent_eng: They applaud their favorite comedienne as she come on the stage.
sentences.sCn: 当他们最喜欢的女喜剧演员登台时，他们鼓掌欢迎。

sentences.sContent: The former broadcaster andcurrent comedienne wenton "Larry King Live" back in 1986.
sentences.sContent_eng: The former broadcaster andcurrent comedienne wenton "Larry King Live" back in 1986.
sentences.sCn: 这位曾经的广播员及现今的喜剧女演员曾于1986年接受“拉里金现场”的采访。

sentences.sContent: Lily Tomlin, The Shipping News by E. Annie Proulx: Made into a movie by the same name, this book about a fishing community in Newfoundland kept comedienne Tomlin turning the pages.
sentences.sContent_eng: Lily Tomlin, The Shipping News by E. Annie Proulx: Made into a movie by the same name, this book about a fishing community in Newfoundland kept comedienne Tomlin turning the pages.
sentences.sCn: 莉莉·汤普琳最爱的一本书是《航运新闻》，作者是E。安妮·普罗克斯：有一部同名电影便是由此改编，这本讲述纽芬兰小渔村的故事吸引喜剧女演员汤普林一口气读完。

trans.tranCn: 喜剧女演员； 滑稽人物
